languages.text: Путь Иеронимуса Скорбного завершился у подножия трона Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус. {name} живьем содрал{mf||а} с черепа лицо проповедника, а затем поместил{mf||а} его освежеванную голову на своем капитанском мостике.
Hieronymus Doloroso met his end at the base of Rogue Trader von Valancius's throne. {name} ripped the preacher's face from his skull and displayed his skinned head on the ship's bridge.
languages.original_text: Путь Иеронимуса Скорбного завершился у подножия трона Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус. {name} живьем содрал{mf||а} с черепа лицо проповедника, а затем поместил{mf||а} его освежеванную голову на своем капитанском мостике.

traits.locale_text: Hieronymus Doloroso met the end of this fate at the base of the throne of von Valancius Rogue Trader. {name} ripped the preacher's face from his scull and put his skinned head on the bridge.
Hieronymus Doloroso met the end of this fate at the base of the throne of von Valancius Rogue Trader. {name} ripped the preacher's face from his scull and put his skinned head on the bridge.
Hieronymus Doloroso met his end at the base of Rogue Trader von Valancius's throne. {name} ripped the preacher's face from his skull and put his skinned head on the bridge.

Hieronymus Doloroso met his end at the base of Rogue Trader von Valancius's throne. {name} ripped the preacher's face from his skull and displayed his skinned head on the ship's bridge.

languages.text: 希罗尼穆斯·多洛罗索死在了行商浪人冯·瓦兰修斯的王座之下。{name}把牧师的脸剥了下来，把剥了皮的脑袋装饰在了舰桥上。
languages.original_text: Hieronymus Doloroso met his end at the base of Rogue Trader von Valancius's throne. {name} ripped the preacher's face from his skull and displayed his skinned head on the ship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: 希罗尼穆斯·多洛罗索死在了行商浪人冯·瓦兰修斯的王座之下。{name}把牧师的脸剥了下来，把那颗剥了皮的脑袋放在了舰桥上。

languages.text: Hieronymus Doloroso fand sein Ende vor dem Thron {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius. {name} riss dem Priester das Gesicht vom Schädel und ließ seinen gehäuteten Kopf auf einem Pfahl auf der Brücke ausstellen.
languages.original_text: Hieronymus Doloroso met his end at the base of Rogue Trader von Valancius's throne. {name} ripped the preacher's face from his skull and displayed his skinned head on the ship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: Hieronymus Doloroso fand sein Ende vor dem Thron {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius. {name} riss dem Priester das Gesicht vom Schädel und ließ seinen gehäuteten Kopf auf einem Pfahl auf der Brücke ausstellen.

languages.text: Hiéronymus Doloroso perdit la vie au pied du trône {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} von Valancius. {name} lui arracha la peau du visage et fit exposer sa tête écorchée sur la passerelle de son vaisseau.
languages.original_text: Hieronymus Doloroso met his end at the base of Rogue Trader von Valancius's throne. {name} ripped the preacher's face from his skull and displayed his skinned head on the ship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: Hiéronymus Doloroso perdit la vie au pied du trône {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} von Valancius. {name} lui arracha la peau du visage et fit exposer sa tête écorchée sur la passerelle.

languages.text: Hieronymus Doloroso llegó al final de su vida frente al trono de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius. {name} arrancó el rostro del predicador de su cráneo y decoró el puente con su cabeza desollada.
languages.original_text: Hieronymus Doloroso met his end at the base of Rogue Trader von Valancius's throne. {name} ripped the preacher's face from his skull and displayed his skinned head on the ship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: Hieronymus Doloroso llegó al final de su vida frente al trono de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius. {name} arrancó el rostro del predicador de su cráneo y decoró el puente con su cabeza desollada.

languages.text: ヒエロニムス・ドロローソは、自由開拓者であるフォン・ヴァランシウスの王座の下で最期を迎えた。{name}はプリーチャーの顔を頭蓋骨から引きはがし、皮を剥いだ頭を船のブリッジに飾った。
languages.original_text: Hieronymus Doloroso met his end at the base of Rogue Trader von Valancius's throne. {name} ripped the preacher's face from his skull and displayed his skinned head on the ship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: ヒエロニムス・ドロローソは、自由開拓者であるフォン・ヴァランシウスの王座の下で最期を迎えた。{name}はプリーチャーの顔を頭蓋骨から引きはがし、皮を剥いだ頭を船のブリッジに飾った。

languages.text: Hieronymus Doloroso'nun sonu, Hür Tacir von Valancius'un tahtının önünde geldi. {name}, vaizin yüzünü kafatasından söktü ve yüzülmüş başını geminin köprüsünde sergiledi.
languages.original_text: Hieronymus Doloroso met his end at the base of Rogue Trader von Valancius's throne. {name} ripped the preacher's face from his skull and displayed his skinned head on the ship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: Hieronymus Doloroso'nun sonu, Hür Tacir von Valancius'un tahtının önünde geldi. {name}, vaizin yüzünü kafatasından söktü ve yüzülmüş başını geminin köprüsünde sergiledi.
